entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
